```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(
  dev = "cairo_pdf"
)
library(tidyverse)
library(INBOtheme)
if (interactive()) {
  theme_set(
    theme_inbo(
      base_family = "Calibri", # "Flanders Art Sans",
      base_size = 12, 
      transparent = "plot"
    )
  )
} else {
  theme_set(
    theme_inbo(
      base_family = "Calibri", # "Flanders Art Sans",
      base_size = 6, 
      transparent = "plot"
    )
  )
  update_geom_defaults("text", list(size = 3))
}
```
